OOC:(At the moment, GoldenEye has no group.  She is Pred, but no 
group. So it's OK for her to be friends.They don' have to be 
secretive about it for now. But, yes, they will eventually have to 
have their friendship secret. But for now, it poses no problems.)

::GoldenEye::

She smiled, "Good, Follow me." She walked off through the tall 
grasses.

A few miles and a couple of hours later, she arrived at a lake.
The water was clear and cold.  Fish swam close to the center of the 
lake.  "You can swim here. I'll be back with lunch. GoldenEye, Beast 
Mode!" She transformed into eagle and flew up into the sky.  She 
circled the lake and swooped down with her talons outstretched and 
skimmed the surface of the water.  She dropped a large fish next to 
Tails. She flew up again for another round.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Danielle Laing <sky_duv@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Ya know what's be cool? If I went on the Maximal
> side, and yet we kept the friendship, but it has to be
> hidden because we're on different factions...whadda
> you say?
> 
> BIC:
> 
> "Alright." Said Tails, nodding appreciatively. "As
> long we're friends. And yeah. I'm starving! Let's find
> some food or something..."
>
